subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Magic Coach Stan Van Gundy expressed a Christmas wish and Orlando rallied from 14 points down to beat Boston, 86-78 - the Celtics’ first loss since Nov. 21.
snippet: Magic Coach Stan Van Gundy expressed a Christmas wish and Orlando rallied from 14 points down to beat Boston, 86-78 - the Celtics’ first loss since Nov. 21.
